import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { ShopContext } from "../../context/bistro_context"; import { PRODUCTS } from "../../products"; import { CartItem } from "../../bistro_cart_item"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import './checkout_page.css'; export const CheckoutPage = () => { const {getTotalCartAmount, checkout } = useContext(ShopContext); const totalAmount = getTotalCartAmount(); return(
